articles.author: Dan Goodin
articles.title: Just about every Windows and Linux device vulnerable to new LogoFAIL firmware attack - Ars Technica
articles.description: UEFIs booting Windows and Linux devices can be hacked by malicious logo images.
articles.content:
92
Hundreds of Windows and Linux computer models from virtually all hardware makers are vulnerable to a new attack that executes malicious firmware early in the boot-up sequence, a feat that allows … [+4118 chars]
